name: Dealing with the Law
text: Give to the Frank Castle player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Frank Castle → remove Dealing with the Law from the game. • Discard all [[ATTACK]] cards from your hand. If no [[ATTACK]] cards were discarded this way, this obligation gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Underworld Dealings
text:
"While superhuman villains rampage on the streets, the criminal underworld is bustling with activity."
Threat may not be removed from this scheme, while there are [[CRIMINAL]] minions in play.
[acceleration]

name: Jigsaw
text: Damage from attacks Jigsaw makes may not be reduced or prevented. Forced Interrupt: When Jigsaw would be defeated, shuffle him into the encounter deck instead. (Punisher's nemesis minion.)

name: Barracuda
text: Forced Response: After Barracuda schemes, deal 2 indirect damage to the player engaged with him.

flavor: "You chill there, big boy. I go find something else to hit you with."
name: The Russian
text: Toughness. Forced Response: After any amount of encounter cards are dealt to you, deal an additional encounter card to you.

name: Detained
text: Attach to your identity card. Your hero may not attack, thwart or defend. Alter Ego Action: Discard an event card → discard this attachment.
